casebody.data:
STATE OF MONTANA, Plaintiff, vs. RONALD LEE POLESKY, Defendant.

DECISION

No. 9501 DATED this 13th day of May, 1977.

The application of the above-named defendant for a review of the sentence of Ten years imposed on April 12, 1976, was fully heard and after a careful consideration of the entire matter it is decided that:

The sentence be and remain as originally imposed.

We wish to thank Mary Krinsky, of the Montana Defender Project, for her assistance to the defendant and to this Court.

SENTENCE REVIEW DIVISION

Jack L. Green, Chairman; Robert C. Sykes, Peter G. Meloy.
